name: UpdateSupportTicket
description:
Modify an existing support ticket in Intercom.

Use this tool to update the details of a support ticket in Intercom, such as status, priority, or assigned agent. This is helpful for managing customer support requests efficiently.

parameters.name: ticket_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the ticket as provided by Intercom.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier for the ticket which is given by Intercom

parameters.name: intercom_version
parameters.description: Specify the version of the Intercom API to use. Options range from 1.0 to 2.9.

parameters.name: ticket_details
parameters.description: A JSON object containing key-value pairs of the ticket attributes to be updated, such as subject, priority, or tags.

value_schema.description: The attributes set on the ticket.

parameters.name: ticket_state
parameters.description: The current state of the ticket. Must be one of: 'in_progress', 'waiting_on_customer', or 'resolved'.

parameters.name: admin_id
parameters.description: The ID of the admin performing the action on the ticket.

value_schema.description: The ID of the admin performing the action.

parameters.name: assignee_id
parameters.description: The ID of the admin or team to which the ticket is assigned. Use '0' to unassign.

value_schema.description: The ID of the admin or team to which the ticket is assigned. Set this 0 to unassign it.

parameters.name: ticket_visible_to_users
parameters.description: Set to true to make the ticket visible to users; false to keep it hidden.

value_schema.description: Specify whether the ticket is visible to users.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Intercom API

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the ticket which is given by Intercom

value_schema.description: The unique identifier for the ticket which is given by Intercom

parameters.name: ticket_attributes
parameters.description: The attributes set on the ticket.

value_schema.description: The attributes set on the ticket.

parameters.name: is_shared
parameters.description: Specify whether the ticket is visible to users.

value_schema.description: Specify whether the ticket is visible to users.

parameters.name: assignment.admin_id
parameters.description: The ID of the admin performing the action.

value_schema.description: The ID of the admin performing the action.

parameters.name: assignment.assignee_id
parameters.description: The ID of the admin or team to which the ticket is assigned. Set this 0 to unassign it.

value_schema.description: The ID of the admin or team to which the ticket is assigned. Set this 0 to unassign it.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
